version_description:
New: Multi account support
New: Dark mode
New: Top Tweets are now even better
New: Expand a Tweet to view threads and replies
New: Follow new users from within Birdie
New: Quote Tweets
New: Reply to Tweets
New: Notifications for Mentions
New: Improved in-app image viewer
New: Tap + hold URLs to bring up share sheet
New: Tapping on a user photo navigates to their timeline
New: View your own profile / timeline

- New: Grouped notifications
- Fix: Logging out and logging in may not work
- Fix: Switching between themes may not update icon colors
- Fix: Saving images may not work correctly
- Fix: Retweet / favorite may not work correctly
- Various stability fixes

Birdie now features a completely redesigned News section! In addition to the best news from your timeline, you can now also customize and access all your favorite news sources for easy access right within Birdie. This includes every major publication, journalist, or even your favorite curator - as long as they have a @Twitter handle, you can read what they have to share! We've refined typography and optimized information density for super readability - as always, we'd love to know what you think!

This update makes Birdie super easy to navigate with a brand new sidebar & sticky header, and adds a more powerful Composer that features autocomplete, photo attachments, and an amazing dark mode. The News section is now even better and you can enable reader mode to remove all distraction!

This update makes Birdie super easy to navigate with a brand new sidebar & sticky header, and adds a more powerful Composer that features autocomplete, photo attachments, and an amazing dark mode. The News section is now even better and you can enable reader mode to remove all distraction!

Introducing Direct Messages! Many of you told us this is the one feature you missed most (thanks for taking our survey). You can now access both DMs & Mentions in the new Conversations tab!

We've also added more power to personalize - you can change font size and pick from 4 stunning themes via Settings! You can also tap + hold items in the Top Menu to reorder them. This works for the Home, News, and even the Conversations tab. So you can tweak Birdie to look & work exactly as you want!

Finally, we’ve made the app more responsive to use - you can swipe between sections, updates & animations are smoother, and Tweets now update in real time, so you'll see updated counts for Retweets and Likes as you're viewing the timeline. We hope you’ll love all the updates - as always, we’d love to hear from you!

This update brings an amazing new News section. Birdie was already great at surfacing the best articles from your timeline and other sources, but we now take this a step further and bring you excellent analysis and interaction options for each article, right in the News Feed! We've also worked hard on polishing the UX - you'll notice cool new animations & haptic feedback, and can now customize the App Icon per your preference. Finally, we've added 3D Touch functionality that lets you perform key actions via the App Icon!
